Robot Test Cases

Value value Value
DocumentationThese test cases test cutting of long error messages.The limits of the algorithm are at most 20 lines, at most 78 characters per line.If a line has more than 78 characters, it will be considered as two (or more) lines by the cutting algorithm

Variable Value Value Value Value

Test Case Action Argument Argument Argument Argument
50 x 1 Message Fail With Long Message 50 1 # Under the limit
100 x 1 Message Fail With Long Message 100 1
50 x 10 Message Fail With Long Message 50 10
150 X 9 MessageFail With Long Message1509
77 x 19 Message Fail With Long Message 77 19
20 x 20 Message Fail With Long Message 20 20 # On the limit
150 x 10 Message Fail With Long Message 150 10
1560 x 1 Message Fail With Long Message 1560 1
8 x 21 Message Fail With Long Message 8 21 # > Over the limit
200 x 7 Message Fail With Long Message 200 7
1600 x 1 Message Fail With Long Message 1600 1

Keyword Action Argument Argument Argument
Fail With Long Message [ Arguments ] ${line_length}=80 ${line_count}=1
${msg} Get Long Message ${line_length} ${line_count}
Fail Unless len("""${msg}""") == ${line_length} * ${line_count} Wrong length # Sanity check. Must have triple
# quotes because ${msg}
# contains newlines
Fail ${msg}
Get Long Message [ Arguments ] ${line_length}=80 ${line_count}=1
${lines} Evaluate [ str(i * ${line_length} + 1) for i in range(${line_count}) ]
${lines} Evaluate [ line.ljust(${line_length} - 4) for line in ${lines} ]
${msg} Evaluate "END\\n".join(${lines})
${total_chars} Evaluate ${line_length} * ${line_count}
${msg} Evaluate """${msg}"""[:-len("${total_chars}")] + " " * 4 + "${total_chars}"
[ Return ] ${msg}
